$ gocdk help init
TODO more about init

Usage:
  gocdk init PATH_TO_PROJECT_DIR [flags]

Flags:
      --allow-existing-dir   true to allow initializing an existing directory (contents may be overwritten!)
  -h, --help                 help for init
  -m, --module-path string   the module import path for your project's go.mod file (required if project is outside of GOPATH)

$ gocdk init -h
TODO more about init

Usage:
  gocdk init PATH_TO_PROJECT_DIR [flags]

Flags:
      --allow-existing-dir   true to allow initializing an existing directory (contents may be overwritten!)
  -h, --help                 help for init
  -m, --module-path string   the module import path for your project's go.mod file (required if project is outside of GOPATH)

$ gocdk init --help
TODO more about init

Usage:
  gocdk init PATH_TO_PROJECT_DIR [flags]

Flags:
      --allow-existing-dir   true to allow initializing an existing directory (contents may be overwritten!)
  -h, --help                 help for init
  -m, --module-path string   the module import path for your project's go.mod file (required if project is outside of GOPATH)
